<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4826</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Designing and Making Ideas</string>
            <string language="es">Diseño y creación de ideas</string>
            <string language="ga">Smaointe a Dhearadh agus a Dhéanamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ideen konzipieren und bildend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concevant et faisant des idées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projetando e fazendo idéias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progettando e facendo le idee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός και παραγωγή των ιδεών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">List of ideas outlining activities that can be conducted in class and how they relate to various strands in the curriculum.</string>
            <string language="es">Lista de ideas que describen actividades que pueden realizarse en clase y cómo se relacionan con varios temas en el currículum.</string>
            <string language="ga">Liosta smaointe dhéanann cur síos ar ghníomhaíochtaí ar féidir a dhéanamh sa rang agus an chaoi a mbaineann siad le sraitheanna éagsúla sa churaclam.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liste der Ideen, die Aktivitäten, die können in
Kategorie geleitet werden und wie sie umreißen, auf verschiedenen 
Fasern im Lehrplan in Verbindung stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liste d'idées traçant les grandes lignes des 
activités qui peuvent être conduites dans la classe et de comment 
elles associent à de divers brins dans le programme d'études.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lista das idéias que esboçam as atividades que 
podem ser conduzidas na classe e como se relacionam às várias costas
no curriculum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lista delle idee che descrivono le attività che 
possono essere condotte nel codice categoria e come si riferiscono ai 
vari fili nel programma di studi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατάλογος ιδεών που περιγράφουν τις δραστηριότητες που
μπορούν να διευθυνθούν στην κλάση και πώς αφορούν τα διάφορα 
σκέλη στο πρόγραμμα σπουδών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
